extracted_information: o1js is a TypeScript framework developed by o1-labs for building applications powered by zero-knowledge (zk) cryptography. It enables developers to write zk circuits, prove and verify them in browser or Node.js environments, and create proofs verifiable by the Mina Protocol. It is released under the Apache-2.0 license.

features.name: zk-SNARKs Development
features.description: Allows developers to write zk circuits for zero-knowledge cryptography.

features.name: Proof Generation & Verification
features.description: Supports proving and verifying zk circuits in both browser and Node.js environments.

features.name: Mina Protocol Integration
features.description: Enables creation of proofs specifically for verification by the Mina Protocol, facilitating zkApp development on Mina.

references.name: zkApp CLI
references.description: Scaffolding tool to start a new project with o1js.

references.name: o1js-elgamal
references.description: A partially homomorphic encryption library for o1js based on Elgamal encryption.

references.name: o1js-pack
references.description: A library for o1js that allows a zkApp developer to pack extra data into a single Field.

references.name: zk-regex-o1js
references.description: A CLI tool for compiling ZK Regex circuits in o1js.

references.name: eddsa-o1js
references.description: A library for provable EdDSA and Twisted Edwards Curve operations.
